```{r cars}
# Not relevant anymore
# This is now added to enhancer_gene_pairs.Rmd 


pairs = data_frame()

for (i in 1:length(ourEnhancerData)){
  trytry = data.frame(distance(ourEnhancerData[i], PROData, ignore.strand=TRUE))

  colnames(trytry) = c("Distance")
  trytry$Gene_row = as.integer(rownames(trytry))
  new_trytry = trytry %>% filter(Distance>2000)
  new_trytry$Enhancer_row = i
  
  pairs <- rbind(pairs, new_trytry)
}

AllData = inner_join(PROseqGeneInfo, pairs, by = "Gene_row")
# The reason why this reduces the amount of pairs is because you only choose the no background. 
AllData = inner_join(our_enhancer_data_no_background, AllData, by = "Enhancer_row")

```
